roleset.name: cause to be in a specific order
roleset.note: SEQUENCE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from sequence.01-v)

role.descr: things put in order or first element

example.name: sequence-v: all args
example.text: I sequenced Mary before John in order of intelligence.

roleset.name: discover the order of constituents
roleset.note: SEQUENCE-V, SEQUENCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia during clearearth-biotexts framing.

role.descr: genome, or the entire group of constituents in a sequence
specific genes (or constituents) looked at within arg1

example.name: sequence-v
example.text: In 2014, researchers elsewhere sequenced the genome of Coffea canephora—commonly known as robusta coffee and used for making coffee blends and instant coffee.
example.arg: the genome of Coffea canephora—commonly known as robusta coffee and used for making coffee blends and instant coffee

example.name: sequencing-n: args 1 and 2
example.text: Genomic sequencing of colorectal adenocarcinomas identifies a recurrent VTI1A-TCF7L2 fusion

example.name: sequencing-n: args 1 and 3
example.text: Genomic Sequencing of Key Genes in Mouse Pancreatic Cancer Cells
example.arg: of key genes in mouse pancreatic cancer cells
